nodes.text: The Jiberah Plains were a geographically flat area of land on the Forest Moon of Endor. It was located south of the Yawari Cliffs, which separated the region from the northern Desert of Salma.

In the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, the Jiberah Plains were one of many designated planetary regions. The game, developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, was shut down on December 15, 2011.
